segments.text: Well , my whole family is in the United States now , but we're from Costa Rica originally .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , so you're from South America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , Costa Rica isn't in South America . It's in Central America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , right . My geography isn't very good !
segments.speaker: S1
